Experience

Web Development Immersive, General Assembly | Nov. 2014 - Feb. 2015, Washington, DC
Twelve-week full stack web development program covering best practices for object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, and test-driven development.

  • + Civic Fix (individual project): Web interface for DC residents to post public service announcements and send emails to public affairs agencies. Built on Sinatra using Ruby.
  • + Trendster (collaborative project): An interactive game using the Twitter REST API, Ruby on Rails, and object-oriented JavaScript.
  • + Read N Ride (individual project): Commuter-friendly article suggestion app built on MeteorJS with WMATA and Longreads APIs.

Program Coordinator, American University | May 2013 - Nov. 2014, Washington, DC

  • + Developed and implemented comprehensive communications strategy for the Comparative & Regional Studies MA program, doubling social media engagement.
  • + Managed program website, including writing original content and building new pages.
